title: LoL Hard locking my PC
body:
Specs:
CPU: Ryzen 3950x
Mobo: MSI MEG X570 Godlike
Ram: 64GB Trident Z Neo 3600
Storage: OS 512gb NvME samsung 970evo and Samsung 860 QVO 2tb SSD for games
GPU: GeForce RTX 2080 XC Gaming 8GB GDDR6

PROBLEM:
Play one to two games and then I have to hard power cycle my PC, and it is only League that does this. I run at all maxed settings.
Other games I play WoW Graphics level 10 NEVER locks me up even in mythic raiding
Witcher NEVER locks up
Overwatch full max settings NEVER locks up
Diablo 3 Max settings NEVER locks up
CoD BO4 max settings NEVER locks up
CoD MW max settings NEVER locks up
Realm Royale max settings NEVER locks up

I think you get the drift by now... However a VERY low demanding game like LoL hard locks my computer... Any ideas as to why this is?
I did it in compatability mode run as admin all that jazz and LoL is the ONLY game that does this.
Uninstall, re-install, run full repair, lower all graphic settings to the lowest, lowest resolution and it still hard locks my system.
Please some help or insight...

replies.body:
What exactly happens when it locks up?

There is really no way for the game (or any user software) to do this unless it is doing something specific that is triggering a stability flaw in the system.
The majority of the time is after a game going from game back to the launcher.  I'd say 8/10 times but once in a while it does when going to lane.
Sometimes I wonder if this is a separate setting on your operating system. I know Windows 10 has a feature that does this if it can detect what game you're playing.

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I've known some people who've gotten good help fixing their crashes by using a support ticket.
